content:
Paul Church said:

Dave deBronkart The CARIN BB IG has a page listing terminologies requiring licenses and their owners: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/Terminology_Licensure.html

This is an absolute keeper of a link - thanks, @Paul Church !

I'm copying it to the #patient empowerment stream.

(For context, this arose in a recent branch of the March 2019 thread HIMSS Definition of Interop in #social )
